org.mongodb

Class MappingFuture<U,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongodb.MappingFuture<U,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - the type mapped from
    V - the type mapped to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<V>, MongoFuture<V>

    public class MappingFuture<U,V>
extends Object
implements MongoFuture<V>
    A future that can map from another Future of type U to a Future of type V.
